content.en: Solar forecasting: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to predict solar irradiance and photovoltaic power output based on weather forecasts. These algorithms, such as LSTM-based models, have shown promising results and outperformed conventional statistical models. Deep learning models, like the hybrid CNN-LSTM model, have also been found to improve accuracy in forecasting. Overall, machine learning models have proven to be more accurate than physical models when the right input parameters are selected.
content.da: Solprognoser: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forudsige solindstråling og fotovoltaisk effekt baseret på vejrudsigter. Disse algoritmer, såsom LSTM-baserede modeller, har vist lovende resultater og overgået konventionelle statistiske modeller. Deep learning-modeller, som den hybride CNN-LSTM-model, har også vist sig at forbedre nøjagtigheden i prognoser. Overordnet set har maskinlæringsmodeller vist sig at være mere præcise end fysiske modeller, når de rigtige inputparametre vælges.
